description.value:
Space Hoverboard! Gives Flyer (15) Trait, must have Pilot (Personal) Skill. Charge lasts for a few hours, depends on speed and distance.

Requirements

Black, featureless boards that float through strange anti-grav engines. Often painted gairish colours.

Effect: Near Unique

Notes: -
